author: Its_the_dankness
body:
Boardgame concept: Options Trading - The Game

2-4 players, there is a vertical digital board that holds 50 stocks that move up or down in value each day. Each turn is a trading day or trading week where you can buy hold or sell your options, and each day / week has one or more cards from a deck pulled ("Trade Talks Going Well, blah blah blah equities rise by X%, blah blah blah equities fall by X%" or "ANALysts think this sector is overbought, suggest derisking, Tech Equities fall by X%). Maybe each of the cards has a small microchip that could be inserted into the board to make the prices change automatically.

author: burdenedworld
body:
From what I read, especially some analysts that I follow via paid subscriptions, many have said to invest in the microchip producing companies.

I've been following all the companies you mentioned via a stock trading app I use and I have to agree with you, the stock price is fairly low at the moment. Once 5g comes on, it'll shoot up massively just like what happened with apple back when iPhone came on the scene.

That's just my opinion and in no way is that financial advice, so carry on doing your own research too. That's my two cents.
